data.name: Attack on I-Ching  进击的易经
data.detailed_description:
story and plot


Reading the book of changes, a magical book in China, I was summoned to a different world by Alice. The law of this world collapses and becomes a fragment of the sixty hexagrams of the book of changes. You fight with Alice, you grow, you beat the monster. While collecting mysterious fragments and learning ancient oriental mysterious knowledge, an adventure to save the world was born

game features


Metroidvania like horizontal scroll game
2D pixel style + exquisite vertical painting with passionate voice
Rich exploration and nostalgic boss war
Understand the basic knowledge of the book of changes
There is a little girl to adjust the tired body and mind in the adventure journey

future planning


An independent game developed by one person inevitably has various shortcomings. I hope friends can support me a lot.
Through future content updates, free DLC (more CG, even the comic book of I Ching by Professor Alice???)

data.short_description: Metroidvania - like horizontal scroll of the independent game. The laws of the universe in the alien world collapse, and Demons breed. These rules are scattered in the world and become the symbols of the 64 hexagrams in the book of changes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA OR AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
